title: Road21Bitcoin
author: Road21Bitcoin
content: This is a monitoring thread where you can share some info about websites which are spamming your DM on Discord.SCAM SPAM MONITORING THREADCreated by:  Road21Bitcoin   Started: 8/31/2022  Website | Type | WHOis | Reference   https://bratexbit.com | Giveaway | https://who.is/whois/bratexbit.com | Click Me!   https://clizerix.com | Giveaway | https://who.is/whois/clizerix.com | Click Me!   https://cryptossite.com | Giveaway | https://who.is/whois/cryptossite.com | Click Me!   https://neftibit.com | Giveaway | https://who.is/whois/neftibit.com | Click Me!   https://btcswap24.com | Exchange | https://who.is/whois/btcswap24.com | Click Me!   https://dotxhawk.com | Exchange | https://who.is/whois/dotxhawk.com | Click Me!   https://bintexgrow.com | Exchange | https://who.is/whois/bintexgrow.com | Click Me!   https://bitzudor.com | Exchange | https://who.is/whois/bitzudor.com | Click Me!   https://nerxbit.com | Exchange | https://who.is/whois/nerxbit.com | Click Me!   https://home.cropsfarmer.online | Ponzi | https://who.is/whois/cropsfarmer.online | Click Me!   https://bitmoney-wallet.com/ | Pump & Dump | https://who.is/whois/bitmoney-wallet.com | DC Link!   https://altcoins-wall.com | Pump & Dump | https://who.is/whois/altcoins-wall.com | DC Link!   https://cryptoslark.com | Pump & Dump | https://who.is/whois/cryptoslark.com | DC Link!   https://altcoins-wallet.com | Pump & Dump | https://who.is/whois/altcoins-wallet.com/ | DC Link!   https://bit-tokens.com | Pump & Dump | https://who.is/whois/bit-tokens.com | DC Link! Kindly check this article - 7 Most Common Types Of Cryptocurrency Scams & Tips to Avoid Them: https://coinsutra.com/cryptocurrency-scams/Scam Spam on Discord 2021: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5319446.0If you have receive a familiar messages from Discord you can share it here, just follow the format below and it will be added on the list. Code:[b]Website:[/b][b]Type:[/b][b]WHOis:[/b][b]Reference:[/b]

comments.author: Casino Critique
comments.body: Quote from: Road21Bitcoin on August 31, 2022, 09:46:06 AMThis is a monitoring thread where you can share some info about websites which are spamming your DM on Discord.Let's take care of spamming on Bitcointalk, when you see spams then hit the report button and report it to the moderators. I am sure Discord and Telegram type of apps has their own spam reporting system.

comments.author: Potato Chips
comments.body: Quote from: Casino Critique on August 31, 2022, 11:28:29 PMLet's take care of spamming on Bitcointalk, when you see spams then hit the report button and report it to the moderators. I am sure Discord and Telegram type of apps has their own spam reporting system.I think it's all good, we can always multitask plus the board isn't limited to bitcointalk.Quote from: Road21BitcoinMaybe consider adding related blogs from discord as well? they could help people stay away from scam DMs.https://discord.com/blog/protecting-users-from-scams-on-discordhttps://discord.com/blog/common-scams-what-to-look-out-forI just wanna add that if someone wants to go beyond, they could also report the suspicious user in their mutual server/s (if any) so the mods can kick them. Sometimes, mods would publish an @everyone announcement to warn the server members as well.
